articles.description: As per a study published towards the end of 2020, it was found that out of 3700 hospitalized patients across 8 studies, as many as 14.4 per cent were newly diagnosed with diabetes.
articles.content:
• Diabetes is a common, but serious condition that affects millions of people around the world
